operation.name: insert
operation.sqlmap:
INSERT INTO project_recovery_litigation_before_preservation_precaution(
project_recovery_id, project_recovery_litigation_before_preservation_id, project_recovery_litigation_preservation_id, project_recovery_litigation_type, project_recovery_preservation_type, preservation_content, preservation_time_start, preservation_time_end, memo, end_notice, raw_add_time ) VALUES ( #projectRecoveryId#, #projectRecoveryLitigationBeforePreservationId#, #projectRecoveryLitigationPreservationId#, #projectRecoveryLitigationType#, #projectRecoveryPreservationType#, #preservationContent#, #preservationTimeStart#, #preservationTimeEnd#, #memo#, #endNotice#, #rawAddTime# )
<selectKey resultClass ="long" keyProperty ="id" > SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID </selectKey>

operation.name: findNoticeByEndTime

operation.sql: DELETE FROM project_recovery_litigation_before_preservation_precaution WHERE project_recovery_id=? and project_recovery_litigation_type = ?
